name: Gemini 2.0 Flash-Lite-001
description: Stable numbered version of Gemini 2.0 Flash-Lite. Google's fastest and most cost-efficient 2.0 model, optimized for low-latency, high-volume applications.
notes: Numbered stable release (001). Generally available. Priced at half the cost of GPT-4o mini. Better quality than 1.5 Flash at same speed and cost. Ideal for cost-sensitive applications requiring good performance at scale.
